text: The Tehran Times is a daily newspaper in English, published in Iran since 1979. It calls itself the "voice of the Islamic Revolution." Although it is not owned by the government, it is controlled by the state and linked to strict political groups in Iran. Experts, diplomats, and policymakers often write for the newspaper. ==References== ==Othre websites== * * The History and Impact of the Tehran Times Category:1970s establishments in Iran Category:1979 establishments in Asia Category:English-language newspapers published in Asia Category:Persian culture Category:Mass media in Iran
title: Tehran Times
